H0.text: Algae like fertilizer is the clear and testable hypothesis guiding the student’s investigation of growing algal colonies in solutions with different concentrations of liquid fertilizer.

H1.text: Fertilizer is good for algae is the clear and testable hypothesis that guides a student’s investigation of growing algal colonies in solutions with different concentrations of liquid fertilizer.

H2.text: Fertilizer improves the genetic traits of algae is the clear and testable hypothesis that guides the student’s investigation of growing algal colonies in solutions with different concentrations of liquid fertilizer.

H3.text: Algal growth rate increases with fertilizer concentration is a clear and testable hypothesis guiding the student’s investigation into growing algal colonies in solutions with different concentrations of liquid fertilizer.

A4.text: Agricultural Research Service scientists found that 60–90% of nitrogen runoff and 70–100% of phosphorus runoff can be captured from manure effluents using a horizontal algae scrubber, also called an algal turf scrubber (ATS).
